channel.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
channel.description:
The original level in Source ![](upload://uotGZXq4AoG9QEfgqXRp0SEKgpK.jpeg) Alleged Source 2 screenshot ![](upload://kyHHE5wGvdPtvdTRZSak2Ehm4ab.png)
![](upload://aDIzKH5kpVRfZyByAatjflHXcEN.png) ![](upload://aOhs7uHg1MjxlqVCo4jdCIL0Rhq.png) [quote] Famed NeoGAF leaker CBOAT has posted a screencap of what appears to be a Valve slideshow presentation detailing Source 2. The PowerPoint shows Left 4 Dead 2's plantation level rebuilt in the new engine and one of the slides, shown above, is clearly visible. Compressed, but visible.
I don't believe this necessarily backs up Left 4 Dead 3 as something which exists, however that is likely a game we will one day get to play. The leak is the first we've really seen of Source 2 in quite a while, though, and I'm ready to hear more from Valve -- whether that be about the engine, the next game, or probably both. [/quote] [url='https://www.destructoid.com/leaked-presentation-shows-left-4-dead-2-in-source-2-269580.phtml']https://www.destructoid.com/leaked-presentation-shows-left-4-dead-2-in-source-2-269580.phtml[/url]
Full leaked picture: ![](upload://rJr3SWTfAq9QGBmst95IUrfrB1f.jpeg)

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: Swaggless
item.description:
At first, I bought it and got kind of excited… but that tree, and the things you guys are saying here make a lot of sence.

Another thing that kind of bothered me about the remake, is that the mood and style are COMPLETELY different. You COULD posit that L4D2’s style was derived from the engine limitations it faced, but I don’t think that they’d really completely change the style of a map REMAKE, even if it is only for internal testing.

I’m on the “fake wagon” now.

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
^bscly

I don’t remember the last time a leak convinced me of it’s authenticity right off the bat. If t hat’s ever even happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
So if it wasn’t kept internally at Valve, why didn’t the German guy just export/extract the images to see them in their original quality?

I am 99.9% sure that it’s fake at this point.

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked

item.description:
“Rebuilt in Source 2.0 with increased level of detail”

Somehow, I don’t buy it.

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Maxey:

Because he’s german? Why is that even a mystery?

I understand, but allegedly these screenshots come from valve. I’m just saying, who would switch the default keyboard language on their computer at work? Especially considering the two layouts are very similar and it would be trivial to type in German on an American English keyboard…

edit: ninja’d! thanks, Crypt

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
If it’s supposed to be internal, you’d expect it to be on a machine at Valve, which is in America, an English speaking country.

Though it’s just as possible that the employee is natively German and has their machine set to that.

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Not sure if I want it to be real or not. The leaves on the trees in the background really look shitty, kind of a weird contrast of high and low quality. And it still looks exactly like the original source, just with really high res textures and a high level of detail. My suspicion: somebody’s college project or something that’s being mislabeled as leaked Source 2.

Read full topic

item.title: Source 2 screenshot allegedly leaked
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Maxey:

Gonna play devil’s advocate here. That’s an elaborate fake that could very well been achieved with CSGO’s SDK. Since you’re not going for performance, you can go nuts on detail and reduce the screens’ sizes to hide much of the faked detail.

Also the lighting looks pretty much the same as CS:GO - which isn’t surprising in and of itself, but considering CS:GO only has dynamic shadows with sunlight - it’d be nice to see an indoor scene with dynamic shadows to disprove that

Read full topic
